/comments./gameName: string - The unique identifier for the game. Used to load images, card data, and settings specific to this game.
/comments./addNValue: integer - The default count for the 'Add N Cards' feature in the deck builder UI. Determines how many cards are added at once.
/comments./maxCopiesPerCard: integer - The maximum allowed copies of any single card in a deck, unless overridden by deckValidation settings.
/comments./octgnExport: boolean - If true, enables exporting decks in the OCTGN format (.o8d). Requires a valid octgn.json file for the game.
/comments./groupOptions: array of strings - The card properties available to group cards by in the deck builder interface (e.g., Type, Subtype).
/comments./groupOrder: array of strings - Preferred display order for groups when viewing or exporting a deck. Unlisted groups appear alphabetically after these.
/comments./groupSort: object - Configures how to sort cards within each group. Can specify properties to sort by and custom value orderings.
/comments./filterOptions: array of strings - Card properties that can be used as filters in the card search interface.
/comments./searchPrefixes: object - Maps search prefixes (like 't:' or 'e:') to card properties for advanced search in the UI.
/comments./deckValidation: object - Contains all deck legality rules: minimum/maximum deck size, per-card limits, banned cards, and per-property constraints.
/comments./deckValidation2: usePerCardLimit: boolean - If true, uses a card's own 'Limit' property to determine the maximum allowed copies in a deck.
/comments./deckValidation3: banList: array of strings - List of card IDs that are banned and cannot be added to any deck.
/comments./deckValidation4: propertyLimits: array of objects - Each object sets a minimum or maximum for the number of cards with a specific property value (e.g., max 2 Legendary cards).
/comments./includeSubtitleInTextExport: boolean - If true, appends the card's Subtitle (if present) to its name in text exports, e.g., 'Card Name â€” Subtitle x3'.
